desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.zh_tw: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯對策委員會。与威胁阿拜多斯高中存亡的阴谋斗争，结果会是……？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯对策委员会。与威胁阿拜多斯高中存亡的阴谋斗争，结果会是……？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯对策委员会。与威胁阿拜多斯高中存亡的阴谋斗争，结果会是……？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯对策委员会。与威胁阿拜多斯高中存亡的阴谋斗争，结果会是……？

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.thai: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.ko: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_tw: 由于和風紀委員會的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。對策委員會决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.thai: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.ko: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.

desc.zh_tw: 老师突然将视线与遙香的对上了。遙香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

desc.zh_tw: 亚子首先为風紀委員會发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望對策委員會将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。綾音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏萊的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.

desc.zh_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而對策委員會突然受到遙香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏萊，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，風紀委員會担心夏萊这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.thai: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.ko: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 佳世子希望亞瑠尽快离开，但亞瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子希望阿露尽快离开，但阿露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 佳世子希望亚瑠尽快离开，但亚瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子希望爱露尽快离开，但爱露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.thai: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.ko: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.jp: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.thai: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.ko: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.zh_tw: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳世子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用風紀委員會一事，老实地向對策委員會道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.

Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时綾音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.

desc.zh_tw: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，綾音和茜香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".

desc.zh_tw: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与風紀委員會的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。亞瑠表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示亞瑠真是令人操心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。阿露表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示阿露真是令人操心。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。爱露表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示爱露真是令人操心。

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.

desc.zh_tw: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。亞瑠表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.

But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. desc.zh_tw: 綾音和茜香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在校门口遇到了野乃美，询问了下柴大将的身体情况。老师表示他身体情况不错，但被野乃美猜出大概还有其他问题。野乃美提议先回教室，并表达了对老师这些天来处理事情得感激之情，希望老师能够继续与他们走下去。老师表示了肯定。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.

desc.zh_tw: 白子似乎在对星野进行着严肃的质问，但星野一问三不知。野乃美和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与星野有些事而已”。野乃美表示對策委員會间可没有什么好隐藏的，星野于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被白子骂了”而已。尽管如此，野乃美还是看出了其中的不真诚。

desc.en: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.

desc.zh_tw: 茜香和綾音拿到了阿拜多斯全境的土地所有权地图，表示确认了一个紧急情况。起初，包括星野在内的大多数人都认为阿拜多斯当然由学校所有，但从交易记录上来看，显然大多数土地早已由凯撒集团所有。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.

desc.zh_tw: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和綾音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.

desc.zh_tw: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.

Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.

desc.zh_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.jp: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.thai: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.ko: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.zh_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，對策委員會小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.jp: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.

desc.zh_tw: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。茜香对为什么是風紀委員會长告诉老师的，而綾音则回顾了当时的情况。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force finds that a giant facility has been built in the desert and an unknown force shows up to defend it.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force finds that a giant facility has been built in the desert and an unknown force shows up to defend it.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force finds that a giant facility has been built in the desert and an unknown force shows up to defend it.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force finds that a giant facility has been built in the desert and an unknown force shows up to defend it.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會发现建设在阿拜多斯沙漠的巨大设施，并且遭遇看守该地的来历不明的敌人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会发现建设在阿拜多斯沙漠的巨大设施，并且遭遇看守该地的来历不明的敌人。

desc.jp: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围對策委員會，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.jp: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.thai: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.ko: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.zh_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时綾音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.jp: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

desc.en: The PMC is too strong for everyone to escape. The director of PMC suddenly visits at this time, and Hoshino recognizes him and remembers something.

desc.zh_tw: PMC包围圈过于强大，众人无法脱逃。这时PMC理事突然到访，星野认出了他，记起了一些事情。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.zh_tw: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。星野认出了他，后者像星野问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.thai: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.ko: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.zh_tw: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫對策委員會。星野带着气愤的對策委員會一行人暂时撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.jp: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.

Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.

Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被歌赫娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在沙勒等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.jp: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的綾音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.

desc.ko: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余對策委員會一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".

desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.

desc.zh_tw: PMC带领部队前来驱散阿拜多斯地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的星野“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而阿拜多斯学生会已名存实亡，阿拜多斯已不存在。

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了對策委員會一把。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“對策委員會”尚存抗争，但綾音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.

desc.zh_tw: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.

desc.zh_tw: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.

desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亞瑠抨击對策委員會“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.thai: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.ko: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_tw: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥對策委員會和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.jp: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.thai: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.ko: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.zh_tw: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.jp: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.thai: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.ko: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.zh_tw: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西装人为了自己的实验，威胁[USERNAME]老师放弃星野。但是老师不但不放弃，还宣言一定会救出星野。

desc.en: The Black Suit says he knows quite well about Sensei. In Black Suit's eyes, Sensei is the biggest obstacle and so he doesn't and shouldn't be hostile with Sensei, but rather he should seek cooperation. Sensei asks about his identity, and Black Suit says he is a member of "Gematria". He then asks what Sensei is looking for in Kivotos, but Sensei doesn't listen. The Black Suit adds that, Sensei's behaviour is no longer justified at this time, and he asks whether Sensei even knows well about his rights. He says that Hoshino is no longer a student belonging to Abydos, and mentions about the resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服表示他很了解老师。黑服认为老师的障碍为最大，因而他不想也不应与老师敌对，相反则试图寻求合作。老师询问他的身份，黑服则表示自己是“数秘术”的人，并询问老师究竟在基沃托斯寻求着什么，老师不想岔开话题。黑服继续表示，老师的行为此刻已不具备正当性，询问老师是否明白自己的权利如何。他表示星野已经不再是阿拜多斯的学生，并提到了那封退社申请书。

desc.en: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.

desc.zh_tw: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏萊请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于對策委員會，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏莱请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于对策委员会，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从沙勒请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于对策委员会，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。

desc.en: The Black Suit gets the idea and disdains such troublesome procedures. Sensei then goes on criticizing the Black Suits, saying they "not only deceive those childrens, tramp their hearts, but also take advantages of their sufferings." The Black Suit doesn't deny the fact that he pursues self-interests, but that's with a clear boundary: the desertification of Abydos isn't their doings, and they are just taking advantages of this disaster.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服明白了这点，鄙夷这种麻烦的手续。老师又接着批判黑服，“不但欺骗那些孩子，践踏她们的心，还利用她们的痛苦”。黑服并不否认追求自己利益这一点，但划分了界限：阿拜多斯的沙漠化并非他们造成，他们只是利用了这一灾难。

desc.en: "Those with power exploit those without, those with knowledge exploit those without," Black Suit explains the truth about the world to Sensei. The Black Suit repeats that deal, wanting Sensei to stop interfering them. They promises they will take on half of the debt, and they can keep others at Abydos High School safe and sound. But Sensei rejects it still.

desc.zh_tw: “有权者压榨无权者，有识者压榨无知者，”黑服向老师阐述了这一世间真理。黑服重复了那个提案，让老师放弃干涉他们，由他们承担一半的债务，同时也不会影响阿拜多斯其他学生的上学。但老师拒绝了提案。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot comprehend Sensei's choice. He doubts about the ability that Sensei possesses to be enemy with them, and Sensei takes out the Adult's Card - a weapon exclusive to Sensei. But the Black Suit warns Sensei, that the more he use it, the more it will be destroyed, and it will also cost Sensei's life and time. The Black Suit reminds Sensei that he still need to do a lot of daily stuff with it, and mentions again that this has nothing to do with him in the very beginning. Yet Sensei rejects that again.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他质疑老师与他们敌对的作战能力，老师不得不掏出大人的卡片。这是独属于老师的武器，但黑服也警告称，它越是使用越会被毁灭，会消耗老师的生命与时间。黑服提到老师还需要用它做许多其他的日常事情，还提到这本就与他无关，但老师仍然拒绝。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."

Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."
desc.ko: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."
desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他反问老师、质询老师。老师则表示，“对于那些孩子的痛苦，没有人愿意负责。”黑服不解，表示老师与这些孩子没有任何亲缘和血缘上的关系，只是一个正好遇见他们的外人，这些责任并非老师需要承担。老师则只是表示，“那是大人该做的事”。

desc.en: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. "The so-called adults, are the ones who are able to transform the society to one that fits well in their own ideal dream, the ones who make rules, define what's normal or not, who's ordinary or not. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.
desc.jp: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.

The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.
desc.zh_tw: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。

desc.en: Sensei says that even speaking out would not make him understood. The Black Suit declares that the negotiation has broken and tells Sensei the location of Hoshino and the content of the experiment at last. The Black Suit ends with "Then you'd be just rescuing your students," contemptuously, and wishes Sensei good luck.

desc.zh_tw: 老师表示即使说出，黑服也无法理解。黑服表示交涉决裂，最后告诉了老师星野的位置与实验内容。黑服最后轻蔑地说了句：“那你就好好拯救学生吧，”并祝老师好运。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force welcomes Sensei. The all shouts out "Let's rescue Hoshino" loud. Sensei also says that they should "give Hoshino some lessons" and Nonomi agrees that - after all, Hoshino broke her own promise. Sensei even says that they would have lines like "Say to her 'Welcome Back' and should she say 'I Am Back'!"

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出星野吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训星野一顿”，野乃美表示同意，毕竟星野违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出星野吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训星野一顿”，野宫表示同意，毕竟星野违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。

desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.

desc.zh_tw: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助對策委員會。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳世子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，亞瑠表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，阿露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，爱露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的對策委員會一行人面前。對策委員會趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.thai: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.ko: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的對策委員會一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亞瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亚瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的爱露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.

Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.

After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，對策委員會几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.

desc.zh_tw: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。對策委員會将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.

She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.

desc.zh_tw: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

desc.en: In front of Hoshino, there is everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomes Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomes everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I am back."

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.

desc.zh_tw: 所有事件结束后，老师收到綾音寄来的信。綾音向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住對策委員會的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.

desc.zh_tw: 由于老师的帮助，對策委員會现在被正式认定为学校的社团，承担阿拜多斯学生会的职务，不过学生会长是谁尚未决定。

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: The regular meeting of Foreclosure Task Force continues. At the meeting, Serika again proposes a good way to make money: by mining cryptocurrency with GPU. Shiroko suggests that maybe infiltrating a certain building would be better. - though, at the end, both are denied.

desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯對策委員會的定期会议继续召开。会议上，茜香再次提出了赚钱的好方法：通过电脑显卡挖矿赚钱。白子则表示入侵某个建筑物会更好一点。——不过二者均被驳回。
